law.catch_line: Cancellation Of Registration; Certificate Of Withdrawal

text.section: the name of the foreign limited partnership and, if different, the name under which it is registered and doing business in the commonwealth;
the business address of its principal office;
the business address of its principal office in the commonwealth, if any, and the name and business address of its resident agent in the commonwealth;
that the foreign limited partnership is not doing business in the commonwealth; and
that all taxes and fees owed the commonwealth have been paid or provided for.
